activities: Gigamon processes EEA and/or Swiss personal data relating to (1) employees of Gigamon Inc.'s subsidiaries in the EEA for purposes of global HR administration and management; and (2) individual representatives of actual and prospective corporate customers, distributors, resellers, suppliers and other business partners in the EEA and Switzerland, for purposes of invoicing, communicating and administering the business relationship with such corporate business partners.
contacttitle1: Vice President and Associate General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: on-line data, off-line data, HR data, customer data, distributor, reseller, supplier and other business partner data.  Manually processed data included.
recoursemech: EEA Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
